nodes.name: claim
claimWithResolver
setName
node
sha3HexAddress
claim
claimWithResolver
setName
node
sha3HexAddress

claim(address).details: Transfers ownership of the reverse ENS record associated with the     calling account.

params.owner: The address to set as the owner of the reverse record in ENS.

claim(address).return: The ENS node hash of the reverse record.

claimWithResolver(address,address).details: Transfers ownership of the reverse ENS record associated with the     calling account.

params.owner: The address to set as the owner of the reverse record in ENS.
params.resolver: The address of the resolver to set; 0 to leave unchanged.

claimWithResolver(address,address).return: The ENS node hash of the reverse record.

params.ensAddr: The address of the ENS registry.
params.resolverAddr: The address of the default reverse resolver.

node(address).details: Returns the node hash for a given account's reverse records.

setName(string).details: Sets the `name()` record for the reverse ENS record associated with the calling account. First updates the resolver to the default reverse resolver if necessary.

params.name: The name to set for this address.

setName(string).return: The ENS node hash of the reverse record.
